name: Cornerstone Revolutions
tag_list: portfolio-management-software, portfolio-rebalancing, asset-management, order-management-system, financial-advisor-software, portfolio-software
overview:
Cornerstone’s PowerInvestmentTools is a suite of software products and service solutions developed specifically for independent investment professionals. PowerInvestmentTools allow you to flexibly manage the complexities of your practice for however you do businessâ€”both now and in the future.

PowerAdvisor portfolio management software allows you to efficiently manage client’s assets with a single toolset for custodial data processing, performance measurement, reporting, compliance solutions and client billing.

Boost firm productivity and reduce overhead costs with turnkey data management and reporting services for PowerAdvisor and other PMS applications including PortfolioCenter, Centerpiece and Advent/Axys.

PowerTrade Order Management System provides a toolset for managing more accounts in less time through automation of time consuming tasks typically associated with portfolio rebalancing and trade execution.

Publish secure, customized web portals for viewing and printing reports and other documents by you, your clients and your staff. Seamlessly integrate with the most commonly used “best of breed” applications for practice management and benefit from alliance partnerships with industry experts.

PowerInvestmentTools is a complete software and service solution that combines flexibility, proven technology and ease of use for your business needs today and as your practice evolves. With portfolio management services and systems, portfolio rebalancing software, web portals and application integrations, PowerInvestmentTools is a scalable platform supporting your independence and firm growth.
